replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content: 直接把压缩包拖入 hmcl 即可

replies.author: EmptyLava
replies.txt_content:
下载HMCL
https://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mobile=1&mod=viewthread&tid=142335
然后补全即可

replies.author: crylrz
replies.txt_content:
下载HMCL   https://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php? ... read&tid=142335
然后导入整合包
下载到的压缩文件不要解压
导入整合包要压缩文件的

replies.txt_content: 把图二的文件复制替换掉到你现有的客户端，然后开启游戏就行
